title: Did President Trump share a picture of a member of the Berkers for Trump with a Nazi tattoo?
subtitle: President Trump may have welcomed "Bikes for Tramp" into one of his golf courts, but he didn't tweet a picture of someone holding an SS tattoo.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: President Trump shared a picture of the "Cyclists for Tramp" member with Nazi tattoos, one of those who visited him at his golf club in Biedminster.
